title: Typhur Dome 2 Air Fryer is a pro-level addition to your kitchen
description: Typhur Dome 2 Air Fryer is a pro-level addition to your kitchenOne of my favorite recent buys is my air fryer since it makes cooking a bit healthier and at times, more convenient. I’ve been saving...
author: Ida Torres
excerpt: One of my favorite recent buys is my air fryer since it makes cooking a bit healthier and at times, more convenient. I've been saving recipes that I can try out
text: One of my favorite recent buys is my air fryer since it makes cooking a bit healthier and at times, more convenient. I’ve been saving recipes that I can try out and experiment with this kitchen appliance which should make my eating life better. Yet, I’ve always had a mental checklist of improvements: a more compact design, quieter operation, and expanded functionality. So, when I stumbled upon the Typhur Dome 2 Air Fryer, it felt like my kitchen wishes had been heard and answered. Designer: Typhur The Typhur Dome 2 Air Fryer uses the tagline “Bigger, Faster, Quieter” to describe the main features of this appliance. It is bigger as it can fit a 12-inch pizza inside but instead of the usual vertical expansion, it is somewhat bigger horizontally so you can fit more food in it. It is actually inspired by professional pizza ovens so it has reinvented the airflow and circulation of the normal air fryer. It has dual heating elements and a 360-degree airflow so your cooking time is reduced by up to 30%. This air fryer can also reduce the number of appliances in your kitchen as it has 15 different cooking functions. You can use it to air fry, bake, toast, grill, griddle, and even dehydrate. The bottom heating element ensures that you get evenly baked food and can achieve other cooking elements that normal air fryers cannot match. One of my biggest pet peeves with my current air fryer is the noise. The Dome 2 addresses this beautifully, operating at a whisper-quiet 55dB. Its brushless motor reduces noise by 50% compared to competitors, allowing for peaceful cooking sessions. No more battling the appliance’s roar to hear the TV or have a conversation. But the real star of the show, for me, is the self-cleaning mode. As a self-proclaimed “lazy girlie,” the thought of scrubbing greasy air fryer baskets is enough to deter me from cooking altogether. The Dome 2’s high-heat self-cleaning function decomposes grease and grime in the top cavity, an industry-first innovation that’s nothing short of revolutionary. This feature alone saves precious time and effort, making post-cooking cleanup a breeze. A quick wipe-down, and it’s ready for its next culinary adventure. The Typhur Dome 2 Air Fryer isn’t just an appliance; it’s an invitation to explore the world of cooking with newfound ease and efficiency. It addresses the common shortcomings of traditional air fryers while introducing innovative features that elevate the cooking experience.

So, when I stumbled upon the Typhur Dome 2 Air Fryer, it felt like my kitchen wishes had been heard and answered.
